name: Ready Player One: OASIS beta
description: The Ready Player One: OASIS beta is the 2018 beta phase of the immersive virtual universe from the film, Ready Player One.  In the OASIS, you can go anywhere, do anything, be anyone—the only limits of reality are your own imagination.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space
